PSTemplate: The particle system to use for this trail.
FirstSocketName: Name of the first socket defining this trail.
SecondSocketName: Name of the second socket defining this trail.
WidthScaleMode:
Controls the way width scale is applied. In each method a width scale of 1.0 will mean the width is unchanged from the position of the sockets. A width scale of 0.0 will cause a trail of zero width.
From Centre = Trail width is scaled outwards from the centre point between the two sockets.
From First = Trail width is scaled outwards from the position of the first socket.
From Second = Trail width is scaled outwards from the position of the Second socket.
WidthScaleCurve: Name of the curve to drive the width scale.
bRenderGeometry: If true, render the trail geometry (this should typically be on)
bRenderSpawnPoints: If true, render stars at each spawned particle point along the trail
bRenderTangents: If true, render a line showing the tangent at each spawned particle point along the trail
bRenderTessellation: If true, render the tessellated path between spawned particles
